H0.text: What colour is lapis lazuli. Purple

H1.text: What colour is lapis lazuli. Green

H2.text: What colour is lapis lazuli. Gold

H3.text: What colour is lapis lazuli. Blue

A4.text: The intense blue color is due to the presence of the trisulfur radical anion (S•−3) in the crystal.

A5.text: Lapis lazuli is a deep-blue metamorphic rock used as a semi-precious stone that has been prized since antiquity for its intense color.
